manpage.title: isgraph iswgraph

description.para: Determine if an integer represents a graphical character other than a space.iswgraph will be used if c is a printable wide character .

return.para: if c in the range of 0 through 0xFF, then the function returns a non-zero value .otherwise it returns 0

manpage.result: a is a printable character. ' ' is not a printable character. ¡÷ is not a printable character.
